name: The Purgatory: Visual Demo
description:
This is an early visual demo for 

My First Game Jam: Winter 2023

The projects show the visual style for my future game "The Purgatory" a horror gamer heavily inspired by Silent Hill, the game is located in an old abandoned village, discover how we get there and how to escape will be our objective. 

Resources and assets:

HUD icons: icons8.com

Models/Animations: Mixamo.com

Assetsville: https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/

Did it hit plugin:  https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/

OST by: Christian Mejia
